question: What birth control benefits and reproductive healthcare options are offered?
text:
What birth control benefits and reproductive healthcare options are offered?
          
        
All plans on Virginia's Insurance Marketplace cover womens preventive services as required by the Affordable Care Act, which includes FDA-approved contraceptive methods and counseling.  Preventive services are available without any out-of-pocket costs, even if you have not met your deductible, if the service meets the terms of your policy, such as when provided by an in-network provider.  Also, not all drugs are covered, or covered with no out-of-pocket costs.  Be sure to review your plans prescription drug formulary.

NOTE:  Plans sold on Virginia's Insurance Marketplace are not required to cover services for male reproductive capacity, like vasectomies.
